title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (elevation)", June 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 70
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower center: SOUPIERE MILIEU DE TABLE/3/LONGUEUR: 37 1/2 cms/LARGEUR 25 1/2 cms/HAUTEUR 19 1/2 cms
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Oval-shaped tureen drawn in elevation with three applied faceted bands around the upper body, the shallow rounded cover surmounted by an arched handle indicated in green ink below a faceted band flanked by similarly designed scroll handles raised on a round edged recrangular base. Underdrawing in graphite of tureen in golden section.
